channel.title: Donation banner reduced page loading with TB
channel.description: Loading of the wiki pages speed reduced due to the dynamic JS donation banner, sometimes the page doesnt load until i scroll down (stuck on gray color with empty page if left without moving the scroll).

item.description:
Loading of the wiki pages speed reduced due to the dynamic JS donation banner, sometimes the page doesnt load until i scroll down (stuck on gray color with empty page if left without moving the scroll).
